LocalAgentProxy - Class in whitecat.core.agents
A local proxy, that is a proxy that handles an agent locally.
LocalAgentProxy() - Constructor for class whitecat.core.agents.LocalAgentProxy
Default constructor, used by the role engine for instantiating a new proxy after a role manipulation.
LocalForwarderMethodGenerator - Class in whitecat.core.agents
A method forwarder generator that works assuming that the proxy and the agent using the role are local each other.
LocalForwarderMethodGenerator() - Constructor for class whitecat.core.agents.LocalForwarderMethodGenerator
 
LocalProxyHandler - Class in whitecat.core.agents
A local proxy handler for handling source and destination proxies in a local (i.e., not networked environment).
LocalProxyHandler() - Constructor for class whitecat.core.agents.LocalProxyHandler
 
Lock - Annotation Type in whitecat.core.annotation
This annotation must be applied to any mutator method of a proxy in order to avoid the execution of the method while the proxy undergoes role manipulation.
lockAgentProxy(AgentProxyID) - Method in class whitecat.core.ProxyStorage
A method to lock the specified proxy.
LockManager - Class in whitecat.core
A generic lock manager to handle locks (in the Java meaning)
LockManager() - Constructor for class whitecat.core.LockManager
 
lockMap - Variable in class whitecat.core.ProxyStorage
The lock map contains a counter for the locking of role assumption operations.
locks - Variable in class whitecat.core.LockManager
A map with each object associate to an id.
